00063             function                __construct()
00064             {
00065                   try
00066                   {
00067                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00068                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00069                         
00070                         $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00071                         $PageComposerUtilities->add_stylesheet( 
00072                               '{http_host}/'._get_package_relative_path_ex( 'ad::ad_manager::ad_manager_view' , 'last' ).
00073                                     '/res/css/ad_manager_view.css'
00074                         );
00075                   }
00076                   catch( Exception $e )
00077                   {
00078                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00079                   }
00080             }
00081             
00100             function                get_campaigns_and_banners()
00101             {
00102                   try
00103                   {
00104                         $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00105                         $AdCampaignAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_campaign_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00106                         $AdBannerAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_banner_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00107                         
00108                         $Campaigns = $AdCampaignAccess->unsafe_select( 
00109                               'archived = 0 AND creator = '.$UserAlgorithms->get_id()
00110                         );
00111                         
00112                         $Banners = $AdBannerAccess->unsafe_select( 
00113                               'archived = 0 AND campaign_id IN ( '.implode_ex( ',' , $Campaigns , 'id' ).' )'
00114                         );
00115                         
00116                         return( array( $Campaigns , $Banners ) );
00117                   }
00118                   catch( Exception $e )
00119                   {
00120                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00121                   }
00122             }
00123             
00146             function                common_view( $Options )
00147             {
00148                   try
00149                   {
00150                         list( $Campaigns , $Banners ) = $this->get_campaigns_and_banners();
00151 
00152                         foreach( $Campaigns as $i => $Campaign )
00153                         {
00154                               $CompanyTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'company.tpl' );
00155                               $CompanyTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $CompanyTemplate , $Campaign );
00156                               
00157                               foreach( $Banners as $j => $Banner )
00158                               {
00159                                     if( $Campaign->id == $Banner->campaign_id )
00160                                     {
00161                                           $BannerTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'banner.tpl' );
00162                                           $BannerTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $BannerTemplate , $Banner );
00163                                           $CompanyTemplate = str_replace( 
00164                                                 '{banners}' , $BannerTemplate.'{banners}' , $CompanyTemplate
00165                                           );
00166                                     }
00167                               }
00168                               
00169                               $this->Output .= $CompanyTemplate;
00170                         }
00171                         $this->Output = '<div id="ad_companies_list">'.$this->Output.'</div>';
00172                   }
00173                   catch( Exception $e )
00174                   {
00175                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00176                   }
00177             }
00178             
00201             function                view( $Options )
00202             {
00203                   try
00204                   {
00205                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );                     
00206                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_ad_manager_view_common_view' );
00207                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00208                         
00209                         return( $this->Output );
00210                   }
00211                   catch( Exception $e )
00212                   {
00213                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00214                   }
00215             }
00216       }
